title: Claude Code 2.1.0 - Major Release with 1,096 Commits
description: Massive update released on January 7, 2026, featuring complete overhaul of terminal inputs, skills system rework, smoother workflows infrastructure, and enhanced autonomous software development capabilities.

community_feedback.quote: It's breathtaking how fast the Claude Code team ships
AI programming is going to upend traditional workflows

title: Holiday 2025 Changelog - Bug Fixes and Stability
description: Late December 2025/early January 2026 update focused on bug fixes and stability improvements including core Agent functionality, layout controls, and code diff viewing enhancements.

community_feedback.quote: Cursor remains one of the most stable and fastest-updating AI IDEs

title: Copilot CLI v3 API Updates
description: January 8, 2026 update to Copilot CLI including task tool subagent image processing, improved session management using GraphQL ID, better CLI version downgrade handling, and remote session loading capabilities.

title: v3 API Updates - Active Users Endpoint
description: January 9, 2026 API update adding GET /v3beta1 active users endpoint to the Devin API, continuing development on the Devin 2.0 platform with its $20/month pricing model.

community_feedback.quote: Price reduced from $500/month to $20 - a nuclear option in the market

title: CLI v1.5.30 Release
description: January 9, 2026 release of Continue CLI v1.5.30 stable version, with beta release v1.5.30-beta.20260110 following shortly after.

title: January 2026 Changelog Updates
description: OpenAI Codex CLI received updates in January 2026 including security patches, device authentication improvements for headless environments, and various CLI-specific patches. Recent notable update v0.23.0 addressed supply chain vulnerability.

title: Version 0.23.0 - Agent Skills Preview
description: January 7, 2026 major release introducing experimental Agent Skills support, pre-configured monitoring dashboards, and integration capabilities similar to Claude Code. Also includes Gemini 3 series models for free users.

community_feedback.quote: Allows one-click migration of Claude Code skills
Can't use agent skills as of version 0.23.0?
